content: octopus for a preemie crochet pattern cute crochet octopus to make for yourself or for a gift ***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** materials needed - worsted weight cotton yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size c - tapestry needle for weaving in ends octopus measures 7 5 inches from the top of the head to the tip of an unstretched tentacle pattern is written in english using standard american terms level advanced beginner/intermediate this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2018 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
